title: Stochastic Modeling & Statistical Distribution Analysis
desc: Probabilistic modeling project focused on identifying and validating unknown distributions using statistical inference, transformation techniques, and simulation-based analysis.

title: ECE 414 – Embedded Systems & Hybrid Radar Project
desc: Microcontroller-based hybrid ultrasonic–radar sensing system featuring real-time signal processing, interrupt-driven design, and low-level hardware control.

title: MediTanzania – Public Health Platform
desc: UNICEF-backed web platform for healthcare transparency, combining citizen reporting, analytics, and ML-assisted insights.

title: ECE 212 – MIPS Processor & SystemVerilog Labs
desc: Implementation of MIPS architecture components, datapath design, control logic, and SystemVerilog-based hardware simulations.

title: ECE 211 – Digital Circuits
desc: Sequential and combinational logic design including FSMs, traffic-light controllers, Verilog modules, and simulation workflows.

title: CS150 – Data Structures & Algorithms
desc: Object-oriented Java implementations of core data structures and algorithmic problem-solving techniques.

title: CS205 – Web Systems & Full-Stack Development
desc: Full-stack web applications featuring backend APIs, frontend interfaces, and data-driven design.

title: LeetCode Practice
desc: Curated collection of algorithmic problems solved in C++ and Python, focusing on data structures, algorithms, and interview preparation.
